## SolidLineMaterialParameters.fog property

`SolidLineMaterial` extends the ThreeJS `RawShaderMaterial` that does not update fog at runtime, so instead of recompiling everything we pass it in the constructor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fog?: boolean;
```
